description:
The 37th Mechanized Maintenance Battalion gears up to launch a sneak attack at night against the Faith Organization in a complicated multi-step operation.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Satsutaba no Chirabaru Tankou: Kamchatka Hantou Yakan Kishou Dengekisen I
The Coal Mine Littered with Stacks of Money: The Kamchatka Peninsula Nighttime Blitz I
Une mine de charbon pleine de liasses de billets. Blitzkrieg nocturne sur la péninsule du Kamtchatka, partie 1
札束の散らばる炭鉱 カムチャッカ半島夜間奇襲電撃戦 I
